products.title: Vitra Blackout Ecru Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout ecru fabric is a chic light greay, cream shade, it's cool and contemporary and will work beautifully within the home. This shade will work beautifully with natural wooden tones, it is soft and delicate and will provide the perfect finishing touch. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cotton White Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white electric roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. A flame retardant coating makes this sheer electric roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Splash Vine Green Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.title: Smart Hub For Use With Electric Roller Blinds
products.description: Their smart hub brings the finishing touch to your luxury electric roller blinds, simple design and configuration makes set-up a breeze. You can also configure your hubamazon alexa or google homefor the ultimate luxury set up. Their hub comes with the plug and usb - c cord, so no need to worry, just plug in download the neo smart blinds app and raise and lower your roller binds. As a bonus, previously purchased electric roller blinds purchased from us will work with this hub, upgrading all their luxury electric rollers to the next level.
